AuthenticatedAuthentication - Class in shiver.me.timbers.security.spring
This is a very simple authentication is authenticated by default and contains no org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails or GrantedAuthoritys.

B

BasicJwtTokenFactory - Class in shiver.me.timbers.security.token
This is a very basic JWT token implementation, it doesn't even set an expiration date for the token so it will be valid for ever.

StatelessAuthenticationFilter - Class in shiver.me.timbers.security.spring
This filter will check every request for the authorised token and if it finds it authorise the request.

StatelessAuthenticationSuccessHandler - Class in shiver.me.timbers.security.spring
After a successful sign in this handler will add an authorised token to the response that can then be used to authorise subsequent requests.
